data.text:
While the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, 
Montjeu, was pursuing from the outside, from the 
middle of the course came Special Week!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>While the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, 
<story>Montjeu, was pursuing from the outside, from the 
<story>middle of the course came Special Week!

data.text:
On the same stage as the 『Japan Derby』, she's shown us the 
strength and pride of the Derby Uma Musume!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>On the same stage as the 『Japan Derby』, she's shown us the 
<story>strength and pride of the Derby Uma Musume!

data.text:
All of Japan's hopes and dreams, Special Week has 
fulfilled them! The huge cheer from the stands 
are to give praise to that accomplishment!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>All of Japan's hopes and dreams, Special Week has 
<story>fulfilled them! The huge cheer from the stands 
<story>are to give praise to that accomplishment!

data.text: As I thought……the world is quite large.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>As I thought……the world is quite large.

data.text: Montjeu-san……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Montjeu-san……!

data.text: It was a good race, Special Week.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>It was a good race, Special Week.

data.text:
Montjeu-san, in Japan, there are many other amazing Uma Musume 
like El-chan, Grass-chan, and me.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Montjeu-san, in Japan, there are many other amazing Uma Musume 
<story>like El-chan, Grass-chan, and me.

data.text: That's why, next time, let's all run again together!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>That's why, next time, let's all run again together!

data.text:
Fufuu, just how much will Japan's 
Uma Musume continue to thrill me……
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, just how much will Japan's 
<story>Uma Musume continue to thrill me……

data.text: ……definitely, once more.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>……definitely, once more.

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text: Congratulations, Special Week!!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed: <story>Congratulations, Special Week!!

data.text: It was an amazing race!!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed: <story>It was an amazing race!!

data.text: W-what an amazing cheer……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>W-what an amazing cheer……

data.text:
What do you expect? You just beat champions that had gathered 
here from all across the world!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>What do you expect? You just beat champions that had gathered 
<story>here from all across the world!

data.text:
It's probably strange to say this to the participant 
herself but, I would have liked for you to experience 
what it was like from the stands.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>It's probably strange to say this to the participant 
<story>herself but, I would have liked for you to experience 
<story>what it was like from the stands.

data.text:
After all, the voices cheering for Special Week-san 
were coming from everyone in the stands.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>After all, the voices cheering for Special Week-san 
<story>were coming from everyone in the stands.

data.text: Those voices, even I heard all of them!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Those voices, even I heard all of them!

data.text:
Everyone had expectations for me……
that's why I felt like I had to respond in kind!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Everyone had expectations for me……
<story>that's why I felt like I had to respond in kind!

data.text: And then, you really did respond to them.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>And then, you really did respond to them.

data.text: You were really cool……！
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>You were really cool……！

data.text:
Always giving her all to respond to those expectations……just 
watching that Spe-chan, makes me want to run in 
my next race as soon as possible.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Always giving her all to respond to those expectations……just 
<story>watching that Spe-chan, makes me want to run in 
<story>my next race as soon as possible.

data.text:
I'm always being encouraged by Suzuka-san though! 
Even today, just seeing you again after so long, gave me strength!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I'm always being encouraged by Suzuka-san though! 
<story>Even today, just seeing you again after so long, gave me strength!

data.text: And on top of that……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>And on top of that……

data.text: Trainer-san, thank you very much!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, thank you very much!

data.text: Congratulations, Spe.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Congratulations, Spe.

data.text:
Ehehe……up until now, I've run in so many races but, this is the 
first time I've run with so many expectations of me……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe……up until now, I've run in so many races but, this is the 
<story>first time I've run with so many expectations of me……!

data.text:
The reason I was able to respond to all these expectations, 
is because Trainer-san was always there with me!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>The reason I was able to respond to all these expectations, 
<story>is because Trainer-san was always there with me!

data.text:
Saying that, Special Week had the 
usual carefree smile on her face.
data.processed:
<story>Saying that, Special Week had the 
<story>usual carefree smile on her face.

data.text:
However, everyone in Japan's expectations―― having splendidly 
answered the monumentous task of answering all those dreams, it 
was the most dazzling so far――
data.processed:
<story>However, everyone in Japan's expectations―― having splendidly 
<story>answered the monumentous task of answering all those dreams, it 
<story>was the most dazzling so far――

data.text:
Special Week, congratulations! That was the best! 
Yo, "Supreme Commander of Japan"! "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>Special Week, congratulations! That was the best! 
<story>Yo, "Supreme Commander of Japan"! "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text: ……Eh？
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……Eh？

data.text:
Today's race, I definitely won't forget it! 
It was really moving! For sure, you are Japan's #1 Uma Musume!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>Today's race, I definitely won't forget it! 
<story>It was really moving! For sure, you are Japan's #1 Uma Musume!

data.text: I am…… "Japan's #1"……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I am…… "Japan's #1"……

data.text: Thanks for winning! Special Week!
data.name: Sociable Young Man
data.processed: <story>Thanks for winning! Special Week!

data.text:
Against these strong opponents from overseas…… 
winning against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume……
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed:
<story>Against these strong opponents from overseas…… 
<story>winning against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume……

data.text:
Japan's Uma Musume―― "Japan's #1 Uma 
Musume" can even take on the world!
data.name: Serious-looking Young Man
data.processed:
<story>Japan's Uma Musume―― "Japan's #1 Uma 
<story>Musume" can even take on the world!

data.text: The phrase "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" was mentioned many times.
data.processed: <story>The phrase "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" was mentioned many times.

data.text: Those words were now being said to her in praise.
data.processed: <story>Those words were now being said to her in praise.

data.text: I am……to people all across Japan, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I am……to people all across Japan, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"……

data.text: T-Trainer-san……I……Uu……uuu……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>T-Trainer-san……I……Uu……uuu……!

data.text:
Hey now, we've got the commemorative photo next, you know? 
They'll end up getting your crying face.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Hey now, we've got the commemorative photo next, you know? 
<story>They'll end up getting your crying face.

data.text: But…… I'm "Japan's #1" to everyone～……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>But…… I'm "Japan's #1" to everyone～……!

data.text:
Uwoo～～nn!! You fulfilled their dreams after all! 
It's fine to cry, Spe-chaaaaaan!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uwoo～～nn!! You fulfilled their dreams after all! 
<story>It's fine to cry, Spe-chaaaaaan!!

data.text: Fufuu, I suppose they still can't keep it together……
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, I suppose they still can't keep it together……

data.text: However, this scene is very <Sirius>-like.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>However, this scene is very <Sirius>-like.

data.text: <Sirius>-like, you say……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story><Sirius>-like, you say……?

data.text: Another person had their dream fulfilled by being on this team.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Another person had their dream fulfilled by being on this team.

data.text: ……Ah, you're right.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……Ah, you're right.

data.text: ……Ah, you're right.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……Ah, you're right.

data.text:
When we first met, Special Week was very unrefined. 
That part of her might not have really changed much, but……
data.processed:
<story>When we first met, Special Week was very unrefined. 
<story>That part of her might not have really changed much, but……

data.text:
Her 2 moms, and not just the team's expectations, she fulfilled 
the expectations of many in Japan, without a doubt she's now 
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.processed:
<story>Her 2 moms, and not just the team's expectations, she fulfilled 
<story>the expectations of many in Japan, without a doubt she's now 
<story>"Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text: Were you watching me? Mom……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Were you watching me? Mom……!

data.text: I did it! I became "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I did it! I became "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
